data.title: Vowel Reverso
data.statement:
Reverse the given string, but only reverse the order of characters that are vowels. Consonants should remain in their original positions in the string.

<<Note:>> For this challenge letters {{a}}, {{e}}, {{i}}, {{o}}, {{u}} and {{y}} will always be considered as vowels.

testCases.title: String with Spaces
testCases.testIn: i am a very long string
testCases.testOut: i om y vera lang string

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: this is a very long validator
testCases.testOut: thos as i varo lyng veladitir

testCases.title: A very long string
testCases.testIn: please keep in mind when creating a question to stay concise and give the minimum amount of information needed to solve the problem.
testCases.testOut: pleose keop on mend when creoting a qoistoun to stau cincise end giva the minomym amoont if enfurmatian needid ti selve the prablem.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: adding tags which are related to your contribution will help people decide on which algorithm they will train. if the tag you want to add doesn't exist in our list, check for synonyms before creating it!
testCases.testOut: idding tags whech ero relytod ty oeir cuntrobitien well holp paopla ducody an whech ilgirathm thiy well trion. af thi tog eie went to edd deisn't oxist un ior lust, chock fyr sonenams befera criating at!

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A single string [[s]] consisting of lowercase letters, spaces and punctuation characters only.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> The modified string after selectively reversing only the vowels.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Reverse the given string, but only reverse the order of characters that are vowels. Consonants should remain in their original positions in the string.

Note: For this challenge letters a, e, i, o, u and y will always be considered as vowels.
Input
Line 1: A single string s consisting of lowercase letters, spaces and punctuation characters only.
Output
Line 1: The modified string after selectively reversing only the vowels.
Constraints
1 ≤ length of s ≤ 1000
Example
Input
hello
Output
holle
